title: Women's Summer Maxi Dress Boho Spaghetti Straps Casual Long A-line Smocked Beach Dress Square Neck Flowy Sun Dress
description: MATERIAL: Boho maxi dress made of 100% polyester, this lace-up A-line long beach dress is made of high quality fabric, soft and skin-friendly, the fabric is lightweight and breathable, so you can be comfortable all day long.

FEATURES: summer dress, maxi dress, beach vacation long dress, boho dress, casual maxi dress, spaghetti straps, square neckline, sleeveless, high waist, elasticized waist, ruffled hem, A-line fit, subtle layered detailing on the hemline, make this dress perfect for you.

PAIRING: This beach maxi dress can be worn casually according to your personal preference. This dress can be easily paired with your favorite heels, sandals, wedges, clutches, fashion earrings, sunglasses and hats. Easy to create a summer fashion look.

OCCASION: This casual maxi dress is perfect for daily wear, vacation, beach, pool, travel, date, office, shopping, back to school, nightlife, commute casual, party, wedding or other occasions. You will be a beautiful scenery when you wear this sun dress.

TIP: This smocked maxi dress fabric is comfortable, wrinkle-resistant and no pilling, no color fading, please do not bleach. The size is standard US size, please choose the most suitable size according to your figure.
